page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A VICAR
page.content: I am Fr.Ellis.I take different services such as weddings, funerals, and blessings,baptisms, christenings, and communions.I visit people in their houses if they are too sick or too old to come out.Sometimes I visit people who have had babies or are sad, lonely & frightened.At weddings & communions I wear my vestments and a special scarf called a stole.Out of church I wear a black or grey suit and a dog collar to let people know who I am so that they know it is safe to let me in.The saddest time is when I am taking funerals,some people cry out loud and I try to calm them down.Weddings are usually joyful but when I go to hospitals I try to calm people down and say prayers for their lives.
